content.text:
# List of NBA team presidents

This is a list of National Basketball Association team presidents.
Key
{| class="wikitable"
|-
|style=width:3em"|^
|Denotes leadership role for business operations
|-
|style=width:3em"|*
|Denotes leadership role for basketball operations
|-
|style=width:3em"|~
|Denotes part owner
|}
